issues.description: Documentation shows conflicting bead ID extraction patterns: Phase 4b shows HTML comment pattern but D02 decision and actual implementation should use **Bead:** pattern from step content.
Bead ID format inconsistency: Examples show both bd-abc123 format and specks-xxx format. Per assumptions section, project uses specks-specific prefix.
Phase numbering is non-sequential (Phase 4, then Phase 4b instead of Phase 5).
Examples don't demonstrate the critical error case when steps are missing bead IDs after sync.

drift_notes: Minor drift: The drift assessment shows an additional file .beads/issues.jsonl was modified that wasn't in the expected touch set. This is likely a side effect of running beads commands during implementation.
